title: Learning about light
brief_description: Introduces the basic scientific principles of light using simple examples. Shows the penetration of light through transparent and opaque materials, how light enters the eye, how mirrors reflect light, how lenses bend light rays and how light rays produce color. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
